title: EARLIER SURRENDER TIME
body: Please for the love of salt make us have the ability to surrender at 10, i am so tired of getting owned by a feeding lane and having to sit through 20 mins of pure agony. When the top laner xin is 10 and 1 leagues ahead of everybody else or when someone just decides to afk randomly its just painful i'd rather just surrender and start a new game. I do think if we had a 10 minutes surrender it would make the whole experience of loosing more pleasant and maybe even make people less toxic. Rito plz at the least consider this i strongly believe it would make league a slightly better experience.

replies.body:
It doesn't matter who has the early lead if you can hold on and push the game out to the point when everyone has their full build. 
When the xin inevitably reaches that point first, the enemy team is receiving diminished returns and you will begin to catch up
The longer the game goes on, the less it matters if you lost lane. If you can farm up, defend base & group there's a chance of coming back.
